description: Spawns a new entity and returns a reference to the entity.

params.name: classname
description: The name of the class to spawn.

params.name: origin
description: The position where the entity is to be spawned.

params.name: radius
description: If the entity is a "trigger_radius" entity then this is the radius of the trigger. Otherwise this parameter is invalid.

params.name: height
description: If the entity is a "trigger_radius" entity then this is the height of the trigger. Otherwise this parameter is invalid.
